programme.title: Coupled Up for Christmas
programme.desc: Tiffany finally reunites with her longtime crush, Brett, only to find out he has a serious girlfriend. She decides to pair up with a recently heartbroken Peter to win back the affection of their respective soulmates.

programme.title: Christmas Lovers Anonymous
programme.desc: A best-selling author hides her love for Christmas after an ugly break up, but finds love again when she joins a website for people who are crazy about Christmas.

programme.title: The Heiress of Christmas
programme.desc: Heiress to the famed department store Hamptons, Loryn is put to the test by her grandmother. Things don't run smoothly as Loryn works at the store during its busiest time of the year and tries to impress the handsome but cynical manager Aiden.

programme.title: A Christmas Wish in Hudson
programme.desc: A woman takes a shot at love after seeing a widowed firefighter and chef on a cooking show. With the help of his daughter, the two of them might find love this Christmas.

programme.desc: A lover's quarrel between Erica and Ethan sends her back to camp.

programme.desc: Erica jumps on board a major career opportunity and jets back to a summer in Taipei.

programme.desc: The Clampetts are taken for the new avant-garde social leaders.

programme.desc: Jethro, after a man-to-man talk with Jed, wastes no time in finding a girlfriend.

programme.desc: Love-struck Jethro decides he wants to marry Chickadee Laverne, a brassy burlesque dancer he brings home.

programme.desc: Jed receives news that his multimillion-dollar account is overdrawn by $34.70.

programme.desc: The Clampetts, under the noxious influence of J.D. Clampett, impostor and unemployed actor, go to Hollywood.

programme.desc: The girls take a trip to sell their cattle; a love triangle blooms; Grace tells Marcus about Ingrid.

programme.desc: Two half-sisters are reunited by their father's death and discover they have little in common; a simple mistake forces Claire to make some difficult decisions.

programme.desc: The girls struggle to round up sick sheep and herd them home, Tess and Claire disagree over who is the boss.

programme.desc: The team investigates a journalist's murder; Sue helps a congressional aide.

programme.desc: A talented TV host show profiles a local florist with a groundbreaking same-day-delivery florist service and a long-running flower competition for a chance to land her own show.
